Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human foreskin fibroblasts (HFF):CC50=58.2±3.0 µM,Human erythrocytes:30.7±8.1% Hemolysis=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>81.92µM),Escherichia coli SBS 363(MIC=10.24-20.5µM),Candida albicans MDM8(MIC=2.56-5.12µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=49.9±16.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µM),Human gastric adenocarcinoma CRL-1739(50% Cell death=>64µM),Human skin melanoma MM96L(50% Cell death=8.6±0.8µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(50% Cell death=>64µM),Human myelogenous leukemia K562(50% Cell death=2.7±0.2µM)
